summary: Relating to the Violence Against Women Act; authorizing agreements with the Washington State Office of Crime Victims' Advocacy and the Office of the King County Prosecutor for financial assistance in the operation of programs and services to address domestic violence by the Department of Housing and Human Services and Police Department, increasing expenditure allowances in the 1996 Budgets of said Departments, making an appropriation from Finance General, creating a position in the Police Department, ratifying and confirming prior acts, and making a reimbursable appropriation therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
